phrases_us.phrase: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call love is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed. It hits hard, Morty, then it slowly fades, leaving you stranded in a failing marriage. I did it. Your parents are gonna do it. Break the cycle, Morty. Rise above. Focus on science.
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: What up, my glip-glops?
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. We’re all going to die. Come watch TV.
phrases_us.author: Morty.

phrases_us.phrase: Yeah, I’d like to order one large phone with extra phones, please.” “Cell phone. No-no-no-no, rotary! And pay phone on half.
phrases_us.author: Blue sofa.

phrases_us.phrase: Yea… If you spend all day shuffling words around you can make anything sound bad… Morty…
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: Then it's time to get your beak wet tonight playa!
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: ISN'T IT OBVIOUS MORTY? I FROZE HIM
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: GRAAAAAASSSSSSS… tastes bad
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: He's not a hot girl. He can't just bail on his life and set up shop in someone else's.
phrases_us.author: Beth.

phrases_us.phrase: Five more minutes of this and I'm going to get mad!
phrases_us.author: Goldenfold.

phrases_us.phrase: Nothing to read into there!
phrases_us.author: Goldenfold.

phrases_us.phrase: …not MY fault this is happening
phrases_us.author: Goldenfold.

phrases_us.phrase: Hmmm… human music
phrases_us.author: Jerry.

phrases_us.phrase: I don't get it and I don't need to.
phrases_us.author: Jerry.

phrases_us.phrase: So women like confidence… How convenient…
phrases_us.author: Jerry.

phrases_us.phrase: I'm Mr. Crowbar, and here is my friend, who is also a crowbar!
phrases_us.author: Jerry.

phrases_us.phrase: It's a device Morty, that when you put it in your ear, you can enter people's dreams, Morty. Its just like that movie that you keep crowing about.
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: It's a figure of speech, Morty! They're bureaucrats! I don't respect them. Just keep shooting, Morty! You have no idea what prison is like here!
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: I'm sorry Summer, your opinion means very little to me.
phrases_us.author: Rick Sanchez.

phrases_us.phrase: Ohh yea, you gotta get schwifty
